battleTraits.name: Suppressing Fire
battleTraits.lore: A barrage of shots rains down upon the foe, disrupting their cohesion and leaving them vulnerable.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR **HERO**** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Each time the target uses a ****SHOOT**** ability this phase, if all of its attacks targeted the same enemy unit, after that ability has been resolved, roll a dice. If the result is equal to or less than the number of models in that enemy unit that were slain by shooting attacks this phase, that enemy unit has **STRIKE‑LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Strike Them Down
battleTraits.lore: The soldiers are ordered to cut down the enemy post-haste.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR **HERO**** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit that charged this turn that is wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

In addition, if the target is an ****AELF**** unit, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Hold The Line
battleTraits.lore: A close-formation battleline held by the resolute faithful of Sigmar is nigh impossible to penetrate.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR **HERO**** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** and that did not **charge** this turn to be the target.
battleTraits.effect:
The target has **STRIKE-LAST** and **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

In addition, if the target is ****DUARDIN****, subtract 1 from hit rolls for combat attacks that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Advance in Formation
battleTraits.lore: The sound of boots marching in unison grows louder.
battleTraits.declare:
Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR **HERO**** that has not used an **OFFICAR’S ORDER** ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** and not in combat to be the target.

If the target is ****HUMAN****, you can pick an additional **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of that ****HERO**** and not in combat to be a target. You cannot pick the same unit to be a target of this ability more than once per turn.
battleTraits.effect: Each target can **move** 3". Each target cannot **move** into combat during any part of that **move**.

battleTraits.name: The Officar's Order
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle Round, Start of Battle Round
battleTraits.lore: Reading the flow of battle, a ranking Freeguilder dispatches an order that could well turn the tide in the Sigmarites’ favour.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a battle tactic card in your hand and place it face-down separately next to your other battle tactic cards. The information on it is still hidden from your opponent but make it clear which card is separate. The card stays separate until you use the command on it or score the battle tactic on it as described below.
battleTraits.effect:
When you use the command on that card, it is not discarded but returns to your hand. Your opponent can check the information on it before it returns to your hand. The card goes back to being a normal battle tactic card, with the exception that you cannot use the command on it in the same phase it went back into your hand.

If you did not use the command on the card you separated, you can still score the battle tactic on it at the end of your turn as normal if you met its conditions. If you do so, discard it as normal. If you neither used the command nor scored the battle tactic on the card, it automatically returns to your hand at the end of your turn.

**Designer’s Note:** *This ability essentially lets you use a command ‘for free’, but you have to choose the command at the start of the battle round, so it requires some planning ahead!*

spearheadEnhancements.name: Flask of Lethisian Darkwater
spearheadEnhancements.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Start of Any Turn
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Sourced from the lakewaters of the city of Lethis, when this potion is carefully sipped, its black liquid soothes the body and soul.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Glimmering
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The glinting facets of this tiny fragment of Mallus offer fleeting glimpses of the future.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Each phase, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, or 1 wound roll, or 1 save roll made for your general.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Heirloom Blade
spearheadEnhancements.lore: Wielded in countless battles, the edge of this blade is as keen as the day it was forged.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of your general’s **Master-forged Longsword**.

spearheadEnhancements.name: Brazier of Holy Flame
spearheadEnhancements.lore: The torch borne by this champion symbolises the light of civilisation being carried forth into the darkness of the wilds, a sacred act that emboldens those who march alongside them.
spearheadEnhancements.declare: Pick a friendly **Freeguild Steelhelms** unit within your general’s combat range.
spearheadEnhancements.effect: You can return up to D3 slain models to that unit.

regimentAbilities.name: Ironweld Discipline
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Enemy Shooting Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: With nerves of steel, the crew of the Great Cannon prepare to fire even as enemies close in on all sides.
regimentAbilities.declare: Pick your **Ironweld Great Cannon** to use this ability.
regimentAbilities.effect: It can use the ‘**Shoot**’ ability as if it were your shooting phase.

regimentAbilities.name: For Sigmar, Charge!
regimentAbilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
regimentAbilities.lore: With their blade raised high, the Marshal signals the charge of the Cavaliers.
regimentAbilities.declare: Use this ability before any ****CHARGE**** abilities are used this phase.
regimentAbilities.effect: Friendly ****CAVALRY**** units that **charge** this phase have **STRIKE-FIRST T**his turn.

heroicTraits.name: Grizzled Veteran
heroicTraits.lore: This hero has seen countless battles in their time and is able to withstand even the mightiest blows.
heroicTraits.effect: If the unmodified wound roll for an **attack** that targets this unit is a 1-3, the **attack** fails and the **attack** sequence ends.

heroicTraits.name: Fiery Temper
heroicTraits.lore: While rash and impulsive, this general shows unwavering bravery in the face of the enemy and is often the first to charge into the fray.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, you can re-roll **charge** rolls for friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Master of Ballistics
heroicTraits.lore: This hero takes great pride in the quality of the firearms forged in their city. Thus, they demand the most from the weapons’ wielders in battle.
heroicTraits.effect: If a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit uses the ‘All-out **Attack**’ command in the shooting phase while it is within this unit’s combat range, add 1 to wound rolls for that unit’s shooting attacks in that phase. This effect is in addition to the effect of ‘All-out **Attack**’.

artefactsOfPower.name: Glimmering
artefactsOfPower.lore: The glinting facets of this tiny fragment of Mallus offer fleeting glimpses of the future.
artefactsOfPower.effect: Each phase, you can re-roll 1 hit roll, or 1 wound roll, or 1 save roll for this unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Brazier of Holy Flame
artefactsOfPower.lore: This torch symbolises the light of civilisation being carried into the darkness, a sacred act that emboldens those who march alongside it.
artefactsOfPower.declare: Pick a friendly non-****HERO** CITIES OF SIGMAR **INFANTRY**** unit that is not in combat and wholly within 12" of this unit.
artefactsOfPower.effect: You can return up to D3 slain models to that unit.

artefactsOfPower.name: Sacred Tome
artefactsOfPower.lore: Upon this ancient parchment of this hallowed tome are the litanies of the Cults Unberogen.
artefactsOfPower.effect:
If this unit is not a ****PRIEST****, it has ****PRIEST** (1)**. If this unit is already a ****PRIEST****, add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

If this unit is a ****WIZARD****, it cannot use ****SPELL**** abilities and ****PRAYER**** abilities in the same phase.

abilities.name: Oath and Steel
abilities.lore: The blessing of the maker-gods hardens steel as each suit of armour remembers the hammer blows that forged it.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6. Add 1 to the roll if the chanter is **DUARDIN**.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target that unit until the start of your next turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, add 1 to save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Wrath and Ruin
abilities.lore: The very earth cracks before the priest, venting fire and sulphurous fumes that engulf the enemy.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Roll 6 dice. If the chanting roll was 8+, roll 9 dice instead. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target. If 3 or more damage points are allocated to the target as a result of those dice rolls, ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: Unfaltering Aim
abilities.lore: The moment this prayer is answered, the wind dies down to naught and weapons hold steady as if frozen in time, allowing shots to hit their mark with ease.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR PRIEST** to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn. In addition, if the chanting roll was 10+, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s shooting attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Cindercloud
abilities.lore: Blinding sparks and thick plumes of smoke mask the battlefield and fall upon the enemy ranks, sowing confusion and stifling their assault.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons.

abilities.name: Elemental Lightning
abilities.lore: Lightning bursts from the wizard’s fingertips and arcs towards the enemy with crackling fury.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them that has not been picked to be the target of this ability this turn to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. Then, roll a dice for each other enemy unit within the target’s combat range. On a 4+, inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit.

abilities.name: Speed of the Twin-tailed Comet
abilities.lore: The wizard grants their allies swift-moving bestial forms.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARD** to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** unit wholly within 12" to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: 'Forwards, Dawners!'
abilities.lore: Though the odds of their success have sunk to desperate lows, new Dawnbringer columns plunge into the nightmarish wilds; armed with potent weaponry, ready to drive great spear-like assaults into enemy territory.
abilities.effect: Add 2" to the Move characteristic of friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units in the first battle round.

abilities.name: Bulwark Zone
abilities.lore: Each great fortress-city is able to hold back the enemies at the gates through the discipline and vigilance of their standing armies.
abilities.effect:
Friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units that have the ‘Fortify Position’ ability start the first battle round in a fortified position.

In addition, in the first battle round, subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units while they are wholly within friendly territory.

abilities.name: Faith and Firepower
abilities.lore: The powerful guilds thrive in industrial cities such as Greywater Fastness, leveraging the skill of Ironweld engineers to supply their forces with expertly crafted weapons.
abilities.effect: Add 3" to the Range characteristic of ranged weapons used by friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR** units.

abilities.name: Eldritch Expertise
abilities.lore: Whether from the famed colleges of Hallowheart or the populace of Settler’s Gain, the Collegiate Arcane often assembles forces to escort mages on their quests to acquire powerful artefacts or drive back the forces of Chaos.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **CITIES OF SIGMAR WIZARDS**.
